column1: The research is for Pelli Labs at NYU. You can go to the next parts of the instruction by pressing ENTER.
During the test, there will be several screens with English alphabets and numbers. You can go to the next parts of the instruction by pressing ENTER.
Always fixate your eye on the fixation point(+) screen. Never move your eye away from it. You can go to the next parts of the instruction by pressing ENTER.
Please press the key ok your keyboard to identify the English character that you see on the screen. You can go to the next parts of the instruction by pressing ENTER.

Experiment is about to begin. Please follow the instructions provided earlier. If you face any issues write to denis.pelli@nyu.edu immediately. Thanks for taking the test. You can go to the next parts of the instruction by pressing ENTER.
